attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have no confidence in any manner or form with this labour government I am just a nobody who nobody listen too, but I am fed UP to the backbone WITH this government thinking they can run all over me..No referendum which.. I was promised.. Latest big hand out toO Northern rock BIG BAD Boys..Health MANAGERS who mess up big TIME..BIG hand outs..Fuel rises, Utility rises..Jobs going overseas .What are the answer NO CONFIDENCE....

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
